message.entry: Directory of UI components to register with App Designer:

Registering custom UI components with App Designer creates a resources directory, which must be shared together with the custom UI components to enable the integration of the custom UI components with App Designer.
Are you sure you want to deregister the selected components?
App Designer Custom UI Component Metadata
To configure the component for use in App Designer, specify its information and add its folder to the MATLAB path.
Configuring the componentâ€™s App Designer metadata...
An error occurred while configuring metadata for the component.\n\n{0}
File must be an image of type .png, .jpeg, .jpg, or .gif
Component version cannot be empty and must be of the form Major.Minor
File {0} is not a valid custom UI component class.
File {0} is not a valid custom UI component class because it does not inherit from {1}.
A resources folder with the App Designer metadata has been created.\n\nTo use the component in App Designer, add the folder containing the component and resources to the MATLAB path.
The resources folder with the App Designer metadata has been updated.\n\nTo use the component in App Designer, add the folder containing the component and resources to the MATLAB path.
MATLAB doesn't have write access to the folder containing the component.\n\nwrite access is required to create the resources folder with the App Designer metadata.
To use the component in App Designer, the setup method of the component class must have no required input arguments.
Metadata file under the resources folder in the folder containing component is invalid.\n\nSaving metadata for this component will overwrite existing metadata file.
To use the component in App Designer, the component cannot dynamically add additional components to its parent.
To use the component in App Designer, the component must have its 'Units' property set to 'pixels'.

The class {0} cannot be instantiated because it is abstract. Ensure you have implemented all abstract methods, including the setup and update methods inherited from matlab.ui.componentcontainer.ComponentContainer.

A value has been assigned to the public callbacks: {0}.\n\nTo use the component in App Designer, the component must not assign a value to the public callbacks defined by the component. Instead, use the addlistener function to create event listeners for the events: {1}.

Unable to capture UI component avatar. Users will be unable to see the component preview when dragging the UI component from the Component Library onto the canvas.\nTo capture the UI component avatar, configure your component from an installed version of MATLAB on your computer.
Unable to capture UI component avatar. Users will be unable to see the component preview when dragging the UI component from the Component Library onto the canvas.
Specify optional information about the component, to be displayed in a tooltip
Specify the section of the Component Library in which the component appears
